tool.name: Plot RagTag output
tool.description: to compare query contigs to the reference

configfiles.configfile: agp_file: '${input_agp}' paf_file: '${input_paf}' plot_file: 'ragtag.pdf' fontsize: '${plot_params.fontsize}' gap_size: '${plot_params.gap_size}' min_nmatch: '${min_nmatch}' palette_space: '${plot_params.palette_space}' plot_height: '${plot_params.plot_height}' plot_width: '${plot_params.plot_width}'

param.name: min_nmatch
param.label: Minimum alignment length to include in plot

param.name: palette_space
param.label: Number of unused colours in the colour palette between the query contig colour and the colour of the first reference contig.
param.help: Try a higher value if the query contigs look too similar to the reference contigs.

param.name: gap_size
param.label: Total length of gaps between contigs relative to the total assembly length.
param.help: Try a higher value if the contigs look too close together.

tool.help:
Accepts the PAF and AGP produced by the RagTag Scaffold and draws a plot showing the alignment of the query contigs to the reference contigs.
.. figure:: $PATH_TO_IMAGES/ragtag.png :alt: RagTag plot
